metadata.title: CVE-2024-27354 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in phpseclib 1.x before 1.0.23, 2.x before 2.0.47,and 3.x before 3.0.36. An attacker can construct a malformed certificatecontaining an extremely large prime to cause a denial of service (CPUconsumption for an isPrime primality check). NOTE: this issue wasintroduced when attempting to fix CVE-2023-27560.

criterions.comment: php-phpseclib package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
php-phpseclib3 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
phpseclib package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
